content.body: Is it just me or is ecma-international.org (and all its subdomains) down?

> <@akirose:matrix.org> x-post from IRC, maybe this crowd knows: I have a question for anyone versed in the intricacies of Ecma bylaws. The ExecCom meeting is tuesday and I can’t attend (in my capacity as TC39 chair). Are ordinary members allowed to attend? Can I send a proxy?

You are invited to ExeCom as chair, but ordinary members are not
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @akirose:matrix.org
x-post from IRC, maybe this crowd knows: I have a question for anyone versed in the intricacies of Ecma bylaws. The ExecCom meeting is tuesday and I can’t attend (in my capacity as TC39 chair). Are ordinary members allowed to attend? Can I send a proxy?
You are invited to ExeCom as chair, but ordinary members are not

content.body: Please send an email to Istvan and Patrick, cc'ing me and Joel, to figure out how to join

> <@sffc:mozilla.org> Is it just me or is ecma-international.org (and all its subdomains) down?

They're down, yes. Jordan filed an issue on the Reflector IIRC.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @sffc:mozilla.org
Is it just me or is ecma-international.org (and all its subdomains) down?
They're down, yes. Jordan filed an issue on the Reflector IIRC.
